STARBUCKS EGG BITES CLONE (DOUBLE PROTEIN)

Creamy, sous-vide style egg bites just like Starbucks, but with cottage cheese for double the protein. 28g protein per 2-bite serving vs the original 13g.

28g
Protein
180
Calories
35m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 2 bites

Carbs4g
Fat10g
Fiber1g
Sugar2g
Sodium360mg
DifficultyEasy

MEAL PREP INFO

Batch Size

12 servings

Storage

Fridge: 5 days
Freezer: 2 months

Reheat Options

Microwave: 30-45 seconds ...

VS. STARBUCKS

Compared to the original Bacon & Gruyere Egg Bites:

+115%
More Protein
13g → 28g
-40%
Fewer Calories
300 → 180
-40%
Less Sodium
600mg → 360mg

INGREDIENTS

  • 6 large eggs
  • 240ml (1 cup) liquid egg whites
  • 230g (1 cup) low-fat cottage cheese
  • 60g gruyere cheese, shredded
  • 4 slices turkey bacon, cooked and chopped
  • 2g garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prep

Preheat oven to 325F. Generously grease a 12-cup silicone egg bite mold or muffin tin.

2

Blend

Add eggs, egg whites, cottage cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to a blender. Blend until completely smooth.

3

Add Mix-Ins

Divide bacon and gruyere evenly among the molds.

4

Pour

Pour egg mixture over the bacon and cheese, filling each cup about 3/4 full.

5

Bake

Cover with foil. Bake 25-30 minutes until set and slightly puffed.

6

Cool

Let cool 5 minutes before removing from molds.
